name: Zombie Pool
description:
Victorian zombie shooter, yes.

Small game for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021. We had a lot of plans for the game but stuff happens XD

Controls:

- WASD - Move
- Left Click - Shoot
- Escape - Pause menu
